channel.title: Cache updater for 317, I pay you 5 dollar if you get it to work
channel.description: Hello everyone. I want to create a cache updater for my server. You know what I mean the Searching updates on startup thing. I want to have an updater in my client so whenever I have a new model it downloads the new cache automatically. I don't care if it redownloads the full cache. Does anyone know how to do that? I have seen lots of servers who do it. But i never found a tutorial on it. I hope someone can help me thanks in advance, Artegoworld owner I will pay anyone who can get this to work 5 dollar with paypal. ;D Ps I think it's done in signlink.java in my server, I just can't get it to work and there are no tuts.

item.title: Cache updater for 317, I pay you 5 dollar if you get it to work
item.dc:creator: @artego artego
item.description:
@artego wrote:

I know that the problem is that it downloads the cache on another spot than, and I don’t want my users to have to download more than 1 cache. It should also delete the previous cache. Btw it doesn’t matter if there is a new download link in client.jar, because the client already knows where the previous cache is and won’t redownload it on the same spot.
EDIT: You are right, I should just reupload and increase the cache version, thank you!
Ps If you want I give you some money because you made me realise that, what’s your paypal?

Read full topic
item.source: Cache updater for 317, I pay you 5 dollar if you get it to work

item.title: Cache updater for 317, I pay you 5 dollar if you get it to work
item.dc:creator: @Sagi Sagi
item.description:
@Sagi wrote:

Make a new client.jar with an updated cache dl link.

Read full topic
